Key Match Events: Ravindra Jadeja's 45 not out off 18 balls
Dasun Shanaka's 47 not out off 19 balls
India chased down Sri Lanka's 183 for 5 with seven wickets and 17 balls to spare
Dushmantha Chameera dismissed Rohit Sharma for the fifth time in T20Is
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bhuvneshwar Kumar and Jasprit Bumrah utilized the moisture in the surface effectively
Sri Lanka scored only 15 runs in the first four overs
Gunathilaka's aggressive shots against Jadeja in the ninth over
Nissanka and Shanaka's 72-run partnership in the last four overs
Shreyas Iyer's six fours and four sixes
Sanju Samson's 23 runs off the 13th over bowled by Lahiru Kumara
Jadeja's aggressive start and finishing touches
